document.full_text: american drone aircraft struck the tribal region of south waziristan in at least three attacks on monday, killing 18 people, according to pakistani officials.
document.title: u.s. drone strikes are reported to kill at least 18 in pakistan
lines_and_colors: american drone aircraft struck the tribal region of south waziristan in at least three attacks on monday, killing 18 people, according to pakistani officials.
